examples.text: We had a great time with our bachelor party group. We rented a private room first and afterwards went on in the main room. It was a lot of fun and nice people. I would definitely come back

We booked a max. 8 persons room, although it was 5 of us, it was already pretty crowded in there since the rooms were small and packed. But the guide spoke perfect English and explained how the equipment functioned in thorough details! It was reasonable, 2000ft/person and almost all songs we searched were available. To our surprise, even bollywood options were available! Definitely returning here again for a pleasant evening out with friends!

I enjoyed the atmosphere and found the manager professional and nice. She was also singing with us. However, there was an issue with one of the (male) waiters at the start of the event. When I turned on music in a small karaoke room, he angrily closed it and shouted, saying it was not for our team. I asked him to speak more politely and not shout. I understand he might have been under stress, but a professional approach would have been better.
We had a great time with our bachelor party group. We rented a private room first and afterwards went on in the main room. It was a lot of fun and nice people. I would definitely come back

When I turned on music in a small karaoke room, he angrily closed it and shouted, saying it was not for our team. I asked him to speak more politely and not shout. I understand he might have been under stress, but a professional approach would have been better.
Very nice looking and fun rooms. The tablet to select songs is easy to use and the staff is very friendly

To our surprise, even bollywood options were available! Definitely returning here again for a pleasant evening out with friends!

I understand he might have been under stress, but a professional approach would have been better.

I had an absolutely fantastic time at vibe rooms. All the staff were lovely, the rooms were very nicely styled and really clean. We had the medium room for 1 hour which was NOT enough time. It was very reasonably priced at â‚¬3000 for two people. I recommend this place to anyone who wants karaoke while in Budapest.

A good karaoke establishment.
- The staff is top notch, they are good with people, setting the mood, helping you when needed.
- The karaoke machine works great, but we didn't find most of the songs we were looking for. At least what's in it is good quality. Mics work great, the speakers distort at higher volumes (they are a bit overdriven).
- The room itself (VIP room) had some weird smell, maybe coming from the AC unit or the couches, floor. It would need some deeper cleaning after a big party.
- Toilet was missing the seat. I hope I don't need to explain this one...
Overall, we had a great time, but there is room for improvement.

Booked a room for 2 of us with prosecco included. We had such a great time! The medium room is cosy and well-equipped, most of the songs we wanted were available, the staff is super friendly and we even got fireworks with the prosecco. Such a great experience. Amazing all around!!

The karaoke and rooms were fine.

However, the service were not very accommodating. They lacked a lot of the stuff they had on the menu. They weren't able to change the menu or make any "deals"

There was no toilet seat in the ladies room the VIP room was smelling like mold and there was no airflow. We managed to break a glass and they wanted to make us pay for it. I never experienced this ever. The bartender guy was rude as hell. Not recommendâ€¦

Was rather disappointed.  Walking in it smelt like a moldy basement.  The rooms themselves were OK with the lighting controls, and the music selections were adequate.  Most disturbing however. We were told they accept tips.  I would gladly give if I felt I was getting good service from staff.  No one asked us what we wanted to drink that evening.
Microphone didnt work. No service at all. Free shot for giving 5 stars on Google. The sound from the big karaoke room comes into the small ones.

Disappointing KTV experience. Unstable karaoke system constantly disconnected, and song options were limited, making it challenging to find our preferred songs. Not worth the hype and price considering the technical issues and limited song selection.

Real bad! Been to many karaoke places around the world, this hit the spot of being the worst. The room was small , the system does not work, you cannot edit the playlist properly. We were suggested to connect to and use YouTube songs. The microphones do not even sound like microphones. The staff are unfriendly and unkind, you can hear all the other rooms shouting while you want to sing yourselves. OVERALL:  instead of a great night out you get real beginner standard. They made little to no investment but they want all your money. ğŸ‘ğŸ»
They let us in 5 mins late, and they made us leave 5 mins earlier, and those 10 mins matter because the whole booking was just for an hour.
Really poor. YouTube karaoke, all the staff seemed like they didnâ€™t actually ever want to run a karaoke bar and hated every minute of it.

Booked as the main event for a birthday party at 23:00 tonight, they called us an hour and 20 minutes before our booking to say they had double booked us and we can no longer get our slot, would have been useful to know beforehand as we have already made our way into town and is too late to book somewhere else.
Microphone didnt work. No service at all. Free shot for giving 5 stars on Google. The sound from the big karaoke room comes into the small ones.

Real bad! Been to many karaoke places around the world, this hit the spot of being the worst. The room was small , the system does not work, you cannot edit the playlist properly. We were suggested to connect to and use YouTube songs. The microphones do not even sound like microphones. The staff are unfriendly and unkind, you can hear all the other rooms shouting while you want to sing yourselves. OVERALL:  instead of a great night out you get real beginner standard. They made little to no investment but they want all your money. ğŸ‘ğŸ»

I used a medium room, but it's so different from the Korean karaoke system. The sound of the microphone is too small and there is no echo. If you use the karaoke system, there are almost no Korean songs and they come out with English subtitles, and when you play the songs through YouTube, the sound is so loud that you can barely hear your voice through the microphone, so there's no point in singing in a karaoke. It seems that they operate the karaoke in a place that doesn't have proper soundproofing, so the microphone sound is limited. If you go here thinking of a Korean karaoke, you'll be very disappointed. I just went because it was cheap, but I wasted 20,000 won on taxi fare and 1-hour usage fee. But the staff were friendly. I was just disappointed because the environment was different, but the staff worked hard.

There was no toilet seat in the ladies room the VIP room was smelling like mold and there was no airflow. We managed to break a glass and they wanted to make us pay for it. I never experienced this ever. The bartender guy was rude as hell. Not recommendâ€¦

Was rather disappointed.  Walking in it smelt like a moldy basement.  The rooms themselves were OK with the lighting controls, and the music selections were adequate.  Most disturbing however. We were told they accept tips.  I would gladly give if I felt I was getting good service from staff.  No one asked us what we wanted to drink that evening.
